short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Participate in the tree planting movement with Christian Mall and enjoy shopping benefits. Would you like to enable this feature?
short.ko: 크리스찬 복지몰과 함께 나무심기 운동에 참여하면서 쇼핑 혜택도 누릴 수 있습니다. 이 기능을 활성화하시겠습니까?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Christian mall browser  allows you to join in the “Let’s Save the Earth” movement while enjoying online shopping. Our Mall browser integrates with your Chrome browser, allowing you to shop from over 150k brands and over 550k deals hassle-free. We only ever show you what you have searched for, and never advertise brands. Your privacy and security are our top priorities. When you click on links to various merchants through this extension and make a purchase this can result in christian mall  earning a commission which is redirected to support sustainable programmes.
